ygData.subject: RE: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: Some guy stopped me last week and asked if I was the Harmonic from eqbards, and the contributer to song analysis.  I told him yeah, and the guy wanted to get a
ygData.messageBody:
Some guy stopped me last week and asked if I was the Harmonic from
eqbards, and the contributer to song analysis. I told him yeah, and
the guy wanted to get a screenshot of himself next to me...

jeez, I don't have _that_ big of an ego that needs stroking.

Harmonic.

Oh god, now we have EQ groupies? That's hilarious. I like Harm at least as
much as the next guy, but how little life do you have to have to start
idolizing virtual celebrities?

Kit

Hey, what do you mean over and over and over? I have to have something to
do waiting for that stupid quest gnome in N Karana to spawn... ;-)
